coverages.details: Covers Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement and Third Degree Burns occurring during the trip.

Covers outpatient and hospitalisation medical expenses incurred overseas arising from accident or sickness, emergency dental expenses arising from accident, and accidental miscarriage. Includes treatment by Chinese Physicians and Chiropractors.

coverages.coverage_name: Medical Expenses Incurred Upon Return to Singapore
coverages.details: Covers follow-up treatment within 31 days from return date. If initial treatment was not sought overseas, treatment in Singapore must be sought within 48 hours from return date and continued for up to 31 days. Includes treatment by Chinese Physicians and Chiropractors.

coverages.coverage_name: Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation (Including Mortal Remains) Back to Singapore

limits.type: Per Insured Person up to 70 years
Per Insured Person up to 70 years (Pre-existing Conditions)
Per Insured Person above 70 years (Pre-existing Conditions)

coverages.details: Covers costs for emergency medical evacuation back to Singapore or repatriation of mortal remains. Includes pregnancy-related complications and pre-existing medical conditions subject to specific limits.
Pays a daily cash allowance for each complete day of hospitalisation overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Double Hospitalisation Allowance Whilst Overseas in ICU Arising from an Accident
coverages.details: Pays a double daily cash allowance for each complete day spent in an Intensive Care Unit (ICU) overseas due to an accident. This benefit is payable in lieu of the standard Overseas Hospitalisation Allowance (Section 5).

coverages.coverage_name: Hospital Allowance for Hospitalisation in Singapore
coverages.details: Pays a daily cash allowance for each complete day of hospitalisation in Singapore upon return, if required due to injury/sickness from the trip.
Covers additional accommodation and travel expenses incurred on written medical advice by a qualified medical practitioner as a result of your accident or sickness during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Guardian for Return of Dependent Children
coverages.details: Pays for reasonable travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to travel to accompany your unattended child(ren) (under 18) home in the event of your hospitalisation or death overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Compassionate Visit by a Relative or Friend

limits.type: Per Insured Person (In the event of death)
Per Family (In the event of death)

coverages.details: Covers reasonable travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to travel to you if you are hospitalised overseas for a specified period due to serious injury/sickness, or to arrange for repatriation in the event of your death.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or Damage to Baggage & Personal Effects
coverages.details: Covers loss or damage to your baggage and personal effects during the trip, subject to specified sub-limits per item/category and overall limits. Section (A) limits apply for Elite.

limits.type: Fraudulent use of credit card overseas

coverages.details: Covers costs of replacing lost/stolen passport or travel documents, and loss of cash or traveller's cheques due to theft, robbery or burglary during the trip. Also covers fraudulent use of credit cards. Section (D) limits apply for Elite.

Covers loss of irrecoverable travel deposits or charges paid in advance due to necessary trip cancellation or postponement arising from Insured Events occurring within 30 days before departure. Includes coverage for loss of frequent flyer or similar travel points used to purchase an airline ticket.
Covers loss of irrecoverable prepaid travel costs and additional travel expenses incurred if you need to cut short your trip and return to Singapore due to Insured Events occurring after departure.

limits.type: Loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs (Per Person)
Loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs (Per Family)
Cash benefit for un-utilised paid ticket cancellation (Per Person)

coverages.details: Covers loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas due to Insured Events. Also pays a cash benefit for un-utilised paid event ticket cancellation as a result of the Insured Events arising during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Financial Collapse of Licensed Tour Operators
coverages.details: Covers loss of non-refundable or un-utilised prepaid travel costs and expenses resulting from trip cancellation or curtailment due to the financial collapse of your licensed tour operator, occurring after the date of policy issue.
Covers your legal liability for accidental bodily injury to third parties or accidental loss/damage to third party property arising during the trip.

limits.type: Per Insured Person (Overseas per subsequent 4 hrs)

coverages.details: Pays a cash benefit for delay in arrival of your checked-in baggage for specified durations. Extended to cover delay if your baggage is wrongly picked up by another passenger whilst overseas.

limits.type: Per Insured Person (1st 6 hrs - Overseas or Singapore)
Per Insured Person (Overseas per subsequent 4 hrs)

coverages.details: Pays a cash benefit for delay of your scheduled public conveyance due to any cause outside your control. Payout is based on the difference between actual arrival time and the original scheduled arrival time, for specified durations.
Pays a cash benefit if you are denied boarding on your confirmed scheduled flight whilst overseas due to overbooking and no alternative transportation is made available within a specified time.

Pays a cash benefit if your flight is deviated from its scheduled route due to adverse weather conditions or the emergency medical treatment of a fellow passenger, resulting in delayed arrival at your destination.
Pays a cash benefit for each full 12 consecutive hours of delay resulting from the hijacking of the public conveyance you are travelling on.
Pays a cash benefit if pre-booked hotel facilities become unavailable for use for more than 24 consecutive hours due to breakdown or damage.

Pays a cash benefit if you miss your confirmed onward connecting public conveyance due to the late arrival of your incoming confirmed connecting public conveyance, and no alternative is available within 6 hours.
Pays a cash benefit for each full 48 consecutive hours you are held captive due to kidnapping during the trip.
Extends cover under specified sections (e.g., Personal Accident, Medical Expenses, Travel Delay) to include losses directly caused by an Act of Terrorism, subject to an overall aggregate limit.
Extends the Personal Accident cover (Section 1) to apply if you sustain Accidental Death or Permanent Disablement as an innocent bystander due to war or civil war.

Covers participation in specific amateur sports including tandem air sports (skydiving, hang-gliding, paragliding), snow-skiing, hot-air ballooning, bungee jumping, indoor rock climbing, and trekking up to 3,500m above sea level for all mountains.

Provides cover related to participation in leisure underwater activities like scuba diving (subject to conditions e.g., qualified instructor supervision, depth limits not exceeding 30m) and snorkelling. Aggregate limit applies across relevant sections.
Covers reasonable additional accommodation expenses if your pre-booked accommodation becomes uninhabitable due to specified events (e.g., fire, natural disaster) after your trip has commenced.
Covers reasonable additional travel expenses to reach your destination or return to Singapore if your scheduled travel plans are disrupted after commencement due to specified events.
Reimburses the cost of emergency telephone calls made necessarily in connection with an event for which a claim is payable under the policy.
Reimburses the rental vehicle insurance excess or deductible that you become legally liable to pay as a result of loss or damage to the rental vehicle during the rental period.
Covers necessary expenses for reconstructive surgery, including skin transplantation, required as a result of accidental burns sustained during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Recuperation Allowance Due to Accidental Miscarriage
coverages.details: Pays a lump sum cash benefit if you suffer an accidental miscarriage during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Quarantine Allowance Due to 17 Infectious Diseases Upon Return to Singapore
coverages.details: Pays a daily cash allowance if you are required to be quarantined in Singapore upon return due to being diagnosed with one of the 17 specified infectious diseases contracted during the trip. Diseases include SARS, Dengue, vCJD, Nipah, JE, Malaria, TB, Measles, Rabies, Melioidosis, HFMD, Avian Flu (H1N1, H5N1 etc.), Chikungunya, Mumps, Rubella, MERS, Zika.

limits.type: Loss or damage of golf equipment

coverages.details: Covers loss or damage to your own golf equipment, pays a celebratory amount for achieving a hole-in-one during a game, reimburses non-refundable green fees if unable to play due to covered reasons, and covers accidental damage to a rented golf buggy.

coverages.coverage_name: Free and Automatic Extension of Policy
coverages.details: The policy period will be automatically extended free of charge for up to 14 days if your return to Singapore is unavoidably delayed beyond the policy expiry date due to your injury, illness, quarantine, or the delay/cancellation of the public conveyance you are booked on, provided it is beyond your control.
